metadata.name: PaperABC Letter Z
metadata.description:
**The letter Z. Zee not Zed.**

A series featuring the 26 letters of the Latin alphabet, based on the Phosphate Solid font, hand-crafted from Canson Mi-Teintes paper. 

The pieces were originally created for 36 Days of Type 2022, using multiple layers of cut paper, mixing and remixing patterns and colours. 

Each letter is a 1:1 representation of the individual pieces in the series. 

While each letter was assembled from real physical paper elements, the digital artifact represents the final version of the work. 

There is no real world representation of the work because each letter was disassembled after being photographed, then reused and remixed into further letters in the series. 

Find out [more about the work and special offers for collectors on my portfolio site Â»](https://rachaelashe.com/nft-collections/paperabc)
